name: Plant Parent
description:
Jun has just moved into a new apartment after leaving a toxic relationship. While helping them to move in, their best friend gifts them a plant as a housewarming gift. 

Help Jun take care of their first plant by selecting the best action to meet their plant's needs.

Story, art and script: Hamizah Ismail

Music: Olexy

Font: Tree Root by DisplayStudio_

Assets Used:

  • Cyberpunk Street Environment by Ansimuz
  • Pixel Skies DEMO Background Pack by Digital Moons
  • Dialogue System for Unity by Pixel Crushers
